short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize your chrome tabs through this chrome extension UI! Select the tabs that you would like to add to a group, enter the titleâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize your chrome tabs through this chrome extension UI! Select the tabs that you would like to add to a group, enter the title of the group and select the color for the group. If there is a group that you would like to add a tab to, then select the tabs you would like to add to the group, but make sure that the title and color selected are the same! If you would like to remove a tab, select the tabs you would like to remove and select the remove button!
